WRITING.TEXT: Yes the reload is definitely an issue, I think Chilled Reload is pretty much a must on it, helps some. Man I would poop myself for a Sobek Wraith right now lol.
This is beautiful! Make me one please!
I agree with the justice mod. The justice mod for the Hek is so damn good, they really need to give the Sobek justice mod an update to put it on equal footing.
Yes I like both versions of the hek. Honestly My favorite class of weapons in the game is shotguns.

WRITING.TITLE: What are the communities general feelings on the Sobek?
WRITING.TEXT: I just finished putting 4 formas in to my Sobek, and I have to say I love it. I do have a great riven for it, but imo, acid shells is quite powerful. Reload speed is, I think, it's only real negative, but it isn't as bad with Chilled Reload. Anyway was just wondering what you all thought, also, I'm REALLY hoping for a Sobek Wraith soon.

WRITING.TITLE: Some *Spoilers* about the show Genius, and a question about the history of his first love Marie Winteler
WRITING.TEXT: In the latest episode of the show Genius, Einsteins first girlfriend Marie Winteler's brother (can't remember his name) goes crazy and shoots and kills his mother, and then turns the gun on himself committing suicide. I have tried to find some information on the internet and haven't really been successful. My question is, did this actually happen historically? If someone smarter than myself could point me in the right direction I would greatly appreciate it. TY!

WRITING.TITLE: *Spoilers* for latest episode of Genius, and a question
WRITING.TEXT: I have a question about the latest episode. In it, There is a part where Marie Winteler's brother (can't remember his name) goes crazy and shoots his mom killing her, then commits suicide. I have been trying to do some research and it seems to be very hard to find any info. My question is did this really happen? If anyone more internet savvy than myself could point me in the right direction or give me some sources I would greatly appreciate it, TY.
